name: Zen Garden (itch) (sai.narayan)
description:
Our take on the theme "Only One" is:
One character.  Multiple players.

Gamepad Support only / 2 players only.

Controls:
Analog sticks to move, A to Jump, Y (Hold) to Interact (Recharge and Charge)

Players share controls for all robots actions, make sure to check the screen top edges to check what your moves are! Each box at the top is associated with one players move sets.

Moves change every 30 seconds so be prepared to relearn your move sets!

Objective:
Goal of the game is to have all plant generators powered all at once. A powered generator has any level of charge above zero.

Power a generator by interacting with the battery in the middle of the map, which will recharge you, and then interacting with the generator, which charges them. 

Generators lose charge over time and you will have to go refill them to keep them powered. Don't forget to keep recharging!

Work with your friends or work against them!
